languages.text: "С первого дня, когда я увидел тебя, я знал, что тобой правит чужая рука — куда более опытная и ловкая, чем другой мон-кай. Ты опережал{mf||а} нас с Тазаррой, предугадывал{mf||а} шаги, давал{mf||а} на удивление искусный отпор... и я догадываюсь — нет, знаю! — откуда у тебя такие познания. Только одно существо знало о наших тактических схемах и рейдерских планах в достаточной мере. Ты поможешь мне обвинить ее — и вернуть Опустошительной буре былое благоволение".

"From the first day I saw you, I knew you were being controlled by another hand, far too experienced and flexible to belong to another mon-keigh. You stayed ahead of me and Tazarra, anticipated our moves, fought back with surprising skill... and I can guess — no, I know exactly — how you were able to know so much. Only one creature was sufficiently aware of our tactics and raid plans. You will help me expose her — and restore the Reaving Tempest to its former favour."
languages.original_text: "С первого дня, когда я увидел тебя, я знал, что тобой правит чужая рука — куда более опытная и ловкая, чем другой мон-кай. Ты опережал{mf||а} нас с Тазаррой, предугадывал{mf||а} шаги, давал{mf||а} на удивление искусный отпор... и я догадываюсь — нет, знаю! — откуда у тебя такие познания. Только одно существо знало о наших тактических схемах и рейдерских планах в достаточной мере. Ты поможешь мне обвинить ее — и вернуть Опустошительной буре былое благоволение".

traits.locale_text: "From the first day I saw you, I knew you were being controlled by another hand, far too experienced and flexible to belong to a different mon-keigh. You stayed ahead of me and Tazarra, anticipated our moves, fought back with a surprising skill... and I can guess — no, ! know! — how you were able to know so much. Only one creature was sufficiently aware of our tactical schemes and raiding plans. And I intend to show our supreme overlord that it was one of us who stood behind your success, a daughter of Commorragh who, in an effort to get rid of those who threaten her power, had crossed the line and thereby weakened Commorragh by forging an alliance with the mon-keigh. You will tell my sovereign all this and more."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

traits.locale_text: "From the first day I saw you, I knew you were being controlled by another hand, far too experienced and flexible to belong to a different mon-keigh. You will tell my sovereign all this and more."

traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: « Depuis le jour où je vous ai {mf|vu|vue}, j'ai su que vous étiez {mf|contrôlé|contrôlée} par une main extérieure, bien trop agile et expérimentée pour appartenir à un autre mon-keigh. Vous avez devancé Tazarra et moi, anticipé nos mouvements, riposté avec une habileté surprenante... Et je devine... non, je sais parfaitement, comment vous avez pu en savoir autant. Une seule créature était entièrement au courant de nos tactiques et de notre plan d'attaque. Vous m'aiderez à la démasquer et à rendre à la Tempête ravageuse ses lettres de noblesse. »
languages.original_text: "From the first day I saw you, I knew you were being controlled by another hand, far too experienced and flexible to belong to another mon-keigh. You stayed ahead of me and Tazarra, anticipated our moves, fought back with surprising skill... and I can guess — no, I know exactly — how you were able to know so much. Only one creature was sufficiently aware of our tactics and raid plans. You will help me expose her — and restore the Reaving Tempest to its former favour."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis le jour où je vous ai {mf|vu|vue}, j'ai su que vous étiez contrôlée par une main extérieure, bien trop agile et expérimentée pour appartenir à un autre mon-keigh. Vous avez devancé Tazarra et moi, anticipé nos mouvements, riposté avec une habileté surprenante... Et je devine... non, je sais parfaitement, comment vous avez pu en savoir autant. Une seule créature était entièrement au courant de nos tactiques et de notre plan d'attaque. Vous m'aiderez à la démasquer et à rendre à la Tempête ravageuse ses lettres de noblesse. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: “从我见到你的第一天起，我就知道你身后有另一只手操纵你。你太有经验了，太灵活了，猴子根本做不到这些。你走在我和塔扎菈前面，预测到我们的行动，以惊人的力量反击我们……我能猜得到——不，我心里很清楚，我知道你这些情报都是从哪来的。只有一个人能如此了解我们的战术，对我们的袭击计划如此了如指掌。我要你帮我揭发这个人，让狂风阴谋团恢复往日的荣光。”
languages.original_text: "From the first day I saw you, I knew you were being controlled by another hand, far too experienced and flexible to belong to another mon-keigh. You stayed ahead of me and Tazarra, anticipated our moves, fought back with surprising skill... and I can guess — no, I know exactly — how you were able to know so much. Only one creature was sufficiently aware of our tactics and raid plans. You will help me expose her — and restore the Reaving Tempest to its former favour."

traits.locale_text: “从我见到你的第一天起，我就知道你身后有另一只手操纵你。你太有经验了，太灵活了，普通的猴子根本做不到这些。你走在我和塔扎菈前面，预测到我们的行动，以惊人的力量反击我们……我能猜得到——不，我心里很清楚，我知道你这些情报都是从哪来的。只有一个人能如此了解我们的战术，对我们的袭击计划如此了如指掌。我要你帮我揭发这个人，让狂风阴谋团恢复往日的荣光。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: 「初めてお前を見た時から、誰かが陰で糸を引いていることは分かっていた。とはいえ別のモン＝ケイに仕えているにしては、経験も適応力もありすぎる。お前は俺とタザーラの先を越し、俺たちの動きを予測し、驚くべき技術で反撃した。それはおそらく…いや、間違いないだろう。なぜお前がそこまでできたのか。俺たちの戦術と襲撃計画を十分に把握していた者が、たった一人だけいる。お前には彼女の正体を暴き、リーヴィング・テンペストをかつての在り様に戻す手助けをしてもらおうか」
languages.original_text: "From the first day I saw you, I knew you were being controlled by another hand, far too experienced and flexible to belong to another mon-keigh. You stayed ahead of me and Tazarra, anticipated our moves, fought back with surprising skill... and I can guess — no, I know exactly — how you were able to know so much. Only one creature was sufficiently aware of our tactics and raid plans. You will help me expose her — and restore the Reaving Tempest to its former favour."

traits.locale_text: 「初めてお前を見た時から、誰かが陰で糸を引いていることは分かっていた。とはいえ別のモン＝ケイに仕えているにしては、経験も適応力もありすぎる。お前は俺とタザーラの先を越し、俺たちの動きを予測し、驚くべき技術で反撃した。それはおそらく…いや、間違いないだろう。なぜお前がそこまでできたのか。俺たちの戦術と襲撃計画を十分に把握していた者が、たった一人だけいる。お前には彼女の正体を暴き、リーヴィング・テンペストをかつての在り様に戻す手助けをしてもらおうか」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: "Seit dem ersten Tag, als ich Euch kennenlernte, wusste ich, dass Ihr von fremder Hand kontrolliert wurdet. Einer viel zu erfahrenen und anpassungsfähigen Hand, als dass sie einem anderen Chem-Pan-Sey gehören könnte. Ihr wart Tazarra und mir immer einen Schritt voraus, saht unsere Schritte vorher, schlugt überraschend geschickt zurück ... und ich kann mir denken –- nein, ich weiß es genau – woher Ihr Euer Wissen bekamt. Nur eine Kreatur war hinreichend mit unseren Taktiken und Angriffsplänen vertraut. Ihr werdet mir helfen, sie bloßzustellen – und dass der plündernde Sturm seinen früheren Huld zurückbekommt."
languages.original_text: "From the first day I saw you, I knew you were being controlled by another hand, far too experienced and flexible to belong to another mon-keigh. You stayed ahead of me and Tazarra, anticipated our moves, fought back with surprising skill... and I can guess — no, I know exactly — how you were able to know so much. Only one creature was sufficiently aware of our tactics and raid plans. You will help me expose her — and restore the Reaving Tempest to its former favour."

traits.locale_text: "Seit dem ersten Tag, als ich Euch kennenlernte, wusste ich, dass Ihr von fremder Hand kontrolliert wurdet. Von jemandem mit viel mehr Erfahrung und Anpassungsfähigkeit, als dass dieser jemand ein Chem-Pan-Sey sein könnte. Ihr wart Tazarra und mir immer einen Schritt voraus, saht unsere Schritte vorher, schlugt überraschend geschickt zurück ... und ich kann mir denken –- nein, ich weiß es genau – woher Ihr Euer Wissen bekamt. Nur eine Kreatur war hinreichend mit unseren Taktiken und Angriffsplänen vertraut. Ihr werdet mir helfen, sie bloßzustellen – und dass der plündernde Sturm seinen früheren Huld zurückbekommt."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: «Desde el primer día en que te vi, supe que te controlaba otra mano, demasiado experimentada y flexible para pertenecer a otro mon-keigh. Ibas por delante de mí y de Tazarra, te adelantabas a todos nuestros movimientos, luchabas con una sorprendente habilidad, y puedo intuir... no, sé exactamente cómo es posible que sepas tanto. Solo existe una criatura que conozca tan bien nuestras tácticas y planes de incursión. Tú me ayudarás a desenmascararla, y la Tempestad Asoladora recuperará el favor del que una vez gozó».
languages.original_text: "From the first day I saw you, I knew you were being controlled by another hand, far too experienced and flexible to belong to another mon-keigh. You stayed ahead of me and Tazarra, anticipated our moves, fought back with surprising skill... and I can guess — no, I know exactly — how you were able to know so much. Only one creature was sufficiently aware of our tactics and raid plans. You will help me expose her — and restore the Reaving Tempest to its former favour."

traits.locale_text: «Desde el primer día en que te vi, supe que te controlaba otra mano, demasiado experimentada y flexible para pertenecer a otro mon-keigh. Ibas por delante de mí y de Tazarra, te adelantabas a todos nuestros movimientos, luchabas con una sorprendente habilidad, y puedo intuir... no, sé exactamente cómo es posible que sepas tanto. Solo existe una criatura que conozca tan bien nuestras tácticas y planes de incursión. Tú me ayudarás a desenmascararla, y la Tempestad Asoladora recuperará el favor del que una vez gozó».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: "Seni ilk gördüğüm günden beri başka birinin kontrolü altında olduğunu biliyordum. Mon-keigh olamayacak kadar tecrübeli ve esnek birinin hatta. Benim ve Tazarra'nın hep bir adım önündeydin, hamlelerimizi öngördün, şaşırtıcı bir kabiliyetle savaştın. Bu kadar şeyi nasıl bildiğini tahmin edebiliyorum. Hayır, biliyorum. Taktiklerimizden ve baskın planlarımızdan bu derece haberdar olan yalnızca tek bir yaratık var. Onu açığa çıkarıp Müfteris Kasırga'yı eski görkemine kavuşturmamda bana yardım edeceksin."
languages.original_text: "From the first day I saw you, I knew you were being controlled by another hand, far too experienced and flexible to belong to another mon-keigh. You stayed ahead of me and Tazarra, anticipated our moves, fought back with surprising skill... and I can guess — no, I know exactly — how you were able to know so much. Only one creature was sufficiently aware of our tactics and raid plans. You will help me expose her — and restore the Reaving Tempest to its former favour."

traits.locale_text: "Seni ilk gördüğüm günden beri başka birinin kontrolü altında olduğunu biliyordum. Başka bir mon-keigh olamayacak kadar tecrübeli ve esnek birinin. Benim ve Tazarra'nın bir adım önündeydin, hamlelerimizi öngördün, şaşırtıcı bir kabiliyetle savaştın. Bu kadar şeyi nasıl bildiğini tahmin edebiliyorum. Hayır, biliyorum hatta. Taktiklerimizden ve baskın planlarımızdan bu derece haberdar olan yalnızca tek bir yaratık var. Onu açığa çıkarmamda ve Müfteris Kasırga'yı eski görkemine kavuşturmamda bana yardım edeceksin."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai
